original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL Mobile has introduced an all new, UNLIMITED MAX package, offering customers a new era of limitless potential and maximising every benefit. With the new UNLIMITED MAX package backed by SLT-MOBITEL’s unmatched network coverage and seamless experience, customers can enjoy unlimited data to surf their most favourite social media apps, unlimited calls to any network, along with 1000 SMS and additional Anytime Data for other uses, opening new horizons in the mobile broadband experience.

UNLIMITED MAX sets a new benchmark for value in mobile data. Priced at just Rs. 988 for 30 days or Rs. 288 for 7 days, users have access to unlimited mobile data for Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, Messenger, Instagram, and WhatsApp, along with unlimited voice calls to any network and 1000 SMS with an extra 30GB (1GB Daily) and 7GB (1GB Daily) for other usage.
Customers can simply activate the 30-day plan by reloading Rs. 988 or the 7-day plan at Rs 288. Activations can also be done through the SLT-MOBITEL Self Care app or by dialling #170#.

As the National ICT Solutions Provider, SLT-MOBITEL constantly strives to cater to customer needs with exciting, value-packed offers. With entertainment and social media playing central roles in how Sri Lankans engage online, UNLIMITED MAX delivers affordable, unlimited access. SLT-MOBITEL invites all its customers to elevate life to the next level with UNLIMITED MAX, powered by its superior award-winning network.
